row.cell: Starting at Cagnes-sur-Mer in January, Cirrus des Aigles had already run 6 times by the end of April - one win and five seconds!
5 x Sagaro Stakes 1W 2P|2 x Jockey Club Stakes
4 x Yorkshire Cup 1P|2 x Aston Park Stakes 1W
3 x Lonsdale Cup 2W|2 x Prix Kegorlay 1W
